mapper.select: select ap.activity_participant_id, ap.user_id, ap.content_id, ap.is_participated, ap.participate_length, DATE_FORMAT(ap.add_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as add_date, DATE_FORMAT(ap.update_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as update_date, u.username, u.email from publish_activity_participant ap inner join sys_user u on u.user_id = ap.user_id where ap.activity_participant_id = #{id}
